attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pies are a vital source of nutrition for many people in the north of the country. Not only are they tasty and nourishing, but their innovative design means they can be consumed without the need for crockery or cutlery, therefore removing the need for washing up, and subsequent savings on water and detergents. Pies are environmentally friendly! So we should encourage consumption by removing VAT from pies.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
